judges: Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. Appellant to pay costs.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: James E. McLaughlin, with him William R. Caroselli, Andrew J. Conner, T. P. Dunn, McArdle, Me Laughlin, Paletta & McVay, and Dunn, Wolford & Conner, for appellant.
Will J. Schaaf, with him John A. Spaeder, and Marsh, Spaeder, Baur, Spaeder & Schaaf, for appellee.
